newsitem.title: USA: Blue chips end higher as Fed holds rates unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Blue chips end higher as Fed holds rates unchanged.

text.p: Blue-chip stocks bounded higher Tuesday as the Federal Reserve's decision to keep interest rates unchanged removed a possible roadblock to the market's continued rally.
Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average closed up 21.82 points at 5,721.26.
In the broader market, advancing issues led declines 12-10 on moderate volume of 336 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
